title: typeface for a catering company
content:
Your doing a logotype for a catering company called d’l!sh. I’ve been considering Vag rounded but I feel it needs a bit more character with a hint of sophistication. Your thoughts?

 [‹ Anyone know this Badge logo?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924092722/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45068 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font that is similar to Seravek ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924092722/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45033 "Go to next forum topic")
author: willow35

comments.content: [FF Strada](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924092722/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_strada_ot_condensed_bold_italic/?acs_p=1&sample_text=d%E2%80%99l!sh&sample_size=96) invokes food packaging and is friendly, yet sophisticated.
